name: MetaElfLand Token
description: MetaElfLand is a real game and real Fi developed by MetaSoft Ltd. with the aim to introduce a new norm to blockchain gaming as well as bringing in fair esports mechanics to the industry, with the gameplay revolving around turn-based RPG similar to Pokemon where you roam with your character. Composed of professionals that have held substantial positions in companies, unique gaming mechanics, innovative tokenomics & economic model, as well as a respectable blockchain technology was built over MetaElfLand.
